description: Led the organization and management of technical and non-technical college events, applying design thinking and leadership to improve participant engagement and operational workflows.

Successfully engineered a machine learning solution for a targeted industry problem statement. Performed end-to-end data processing, exploratory data analysis (EDA), and model optimization using Python and IBM-aligned methodologies to achieve high predictive accuracy.
Engineered responsive web applications including a Photo Gallery, Music Player, and Calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, prioritizing clean UI and cross-device usability.
